title: 'Insufficient evidence': US appeals court blocks Trump's request to send National Guard to Chicago
description: A US appeals court has blocked President Trump's order to deploy the National Guard in Chicago, citing a lack of evidence for rebellion or danger. This ruling follows similar challenges from Illinois, Oregon, and California against the administration's use of federal troops domestically.

Ashes: Leaked tapes, tax woes - The shocking fall of England’s WC-winning captain
description: England's assistant coach Paul Collingwood is reportedly out of the Ashes backroom team due to personal reasons, following a series of controversies. These include leaked explicit tapes, a strip club incident before a T20 World Cup match, and a recent £196,000 tax bill from HMRC.

A failed strike and then a 6-day conflict: Meet Mehsud - man who brought Pak to its knees
description: An airstrike targeting TTP leader Noor Wali Mehsud in Kabul failed, intensifying border clashes between Pakistan and Afghanistan. Mehsud, credited with rebuilding the TTP, has shifted tactics to target the Pakistani army, fueling a renewed insurgency from his sanctuary in Afghanistan.

title: Trump's claim on Russian crude oil: Will India stop buying it? Here's what's happening
description: India's Ministry of External Affairs denied knowledge of a call where PM Modi allegedly assured US President Trump of stopping Russian crude purchases. While India diversifies energy sources, driven by market economics and reduced Russian discounts, it also signals potential for increased oil imports from the US.

title: Execution of Indian nurse on death row in Yemen stayed, nothing adverse happening, SC told
Two Indore collegians booked for social media letter falsely announcing principal’s death
‘He can’t be 14’: Shastri reveals chat about teenager’s age; compares him to Sachin
description: Former India coach Ravi Shastri lauded young batter Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, comparing him to a young Sachin Tendulkar and noting Matthew Hayden's disbelief at his age. Shastri emphasized the crucial next few years for the prodigy, stressing the need for guidance to handle high expectations and potential setbacks. He also advised playing red-ball cricket to refine technique and temperament.

title: NGT seeks detailed clarifications on industrial effluent discharge in river Markanda, terms submitted reports ‘deficient’

Gabrielle Union celebrates father’s 81st birthday amid his life-threatening illness
description: Gabrielle Union celebrated her father's 81st birthday with a heartfelt Instagram message, expressing gratitude for their connection despite his ongoing battle with dementia. She shared touching moments, including his joy at seeing her and Dwyane Wade. Their daughter Kaavia also posted a touching tribute to her grandpa with an emotional post reflecting back to the time when she held his arms for first time.

Prof Brian Cox explains origins of interstellar object 3I/ATLAS
description: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS, a 7.5-billion-year-old visitor from the early galaxy, is offering scientists a rare glimpse into the universe's past. Professor Brian Cox marvels at humanity's progress, noting we now photograph such ancient objects from other planets, a stark contrast to just centuries ago when Earth's place in the cosmos was debated. Its unique composition and trajectory provide invaluable insights.

‘We need rare earths’: Anduril CEO says US 'too reliant' on China; calls for action
description: Anduril Industries founder Palmer Luckey warned that the US defense supply chain is overly dependent on China, urging reindustrialization and domestic production of critical components like rare earths and chips. CEO Brian Schimpf anticipates a long-term conflict with China, a sentiment echoed by Palantir CTO Shyam Sankar, who highlighted decades of brewing tensions and China's impact on American prosperity.

Joe Burrow injury update: Bengals QB out vs Steelers after toe surgery
description: The Cincinnati Bengals face the Pittsburgh Steelers in a crucial AFC North game. Quarterback Joe Burrow is out with a toe injury. Backup quarterbacks Jake Browning and Joe Flacco will lead the offense. The Bengals will focus on the run game and short passes. The defense must pressure the Steelers' quarterback. Protecting the ball is key for the Bengals.

Friends over money! Varun’s heartfelt confession - 'I can’t wear a Rs 3 lakh watch'
description: Indian spinner Varun Chakravarthy revealed his internal conflict over spending on luxury items, stemming from a middle-class upbringing.  He confessed to feeling immense guilt over purchasing an expensive watch, believing the money could significantly improve others' lives for generations.  Chakravarthy also shared his discomfort wearing high-value items around friends still facing financial struggles, feeling it disrespectful.

RSS barred in K'taka? Cabinet approves new rules; no activities allowed in public places
description: Karnataka's cabinet has decided to introduce new regulations for Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh activities, including marches and events on government property and public roads.  Information Technology Minister Priyank Kharge stated that permission will be required for such gatherings, emphasizing that organizations cannot operate freely in public spaces. These rules aim to regulate public demonstrations and maintain order.

title: Not just cholesterol: This overlooked blood test can signal stroke risk
description: High homocysteine levels pose a serious risk to heart health and brain function. This often-ignored amino acid can damage blood vessels and lead to blood clots. Research indicates levels above 15 µmol/L are classified as elevated and are associated with an increased risk of ischemic stroke and other vascular events.

title: 'New normal': Is Pakistan 'doing an India' against the Taliban?
MacKenzie Scott cuts Amazon stake by 42%; now holds $12.6bn; prioritises equity work
description: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

title: Ayesha Curry sparks outrage for flaunting luxury life after ‘9 to 5’ remark
description: Stephen Curry's wife, Ayesha Curry, is facing backlash from fans after a recent Instagram post featuring her playing golf with friends. Critics have accused her of not appreciating her husband and her life, stemming from previous comments on a podcast where she revealed she hadn't initially wanted marriage or children.

title: Introspection mode: Zoho founder to take break; warns of this risk
description: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu is stepping back from external commitments to focus on coding, a move driven by his principle of practicing what he preaches. He aims to complete crucial product development, including end-to-end encryption for Zoho's Arattai messaging app, a feature designed to enhance user data privacy by storing information solely on devices.
